config_description: Example configuration file for customizing NaLaMap deployments. Copy and modify this file for your environment.
_comment_geoserver: Configure GeoServer backends that should be pre-added for users

geoserver_backends.name: Corporate GeoServer
geoserver_backends.description: Internal GeoServer with organizational data layers
geoserver_backends._comment: Set preload_on_startup=true to embed layers at server start (faster searches). search_term can filter which layers to preload.

_comment_mcp: Configure MCP (Model Context Protocol) servers for extended AI tools
_comment_model: Override default model settings. Any omitted fields use system defaults.

model_settings._comment: provider options: openai, azure, google, mistral, anthropic. Check /api/settings/options for available models.

_comment_tools: Enable/disable specific tools. Tools not listed use their default state.

tools.name: attribute_tool
tools._comment: Advanced attribute tool, disabled by default

_comment_prompt: Custom system prompt. Remove this field to use the default prompt.
_comment_colors: Custom color scheme. Remove this section to use default IUCN Green List colors.
